GO and KEGG analysis for MAPP paper Chapter 1 Prerequisites 1.1 Libraries 1.2 Options 1.3 Universe set of genes 1.4 Render the book 1.5 Session info

GO and KEGG analysis for MAPP paper Ian U. Kouzel 2022-08-10 Chapter 1 Prerequisites 1.1 Libraries library(tidyverse) library(clusterProfiler) library(pathview) library(enrichplot) library(org.Hs.eg.db) library(readr) library(DT) 1.2 Options # GO analysis minGSSize <- 10 # minimal size of genes annotated by Ontology term for testing organismDB <- "org.Hs.eg.db" # human DB pvalueCutoff = 0.1 # p-value cutoff showCategory = 10 # number of GOs to plot 1.3 Universe set of genes 1.3.1 GO (ENSEMBL) universe <- read.table("inclusion_tables/cassette_exons_universe_table.tsv", header = T) %>% dplyr::select(gene_id) %>% unlist() universe <- unique(unlist(strsplit(universe, ","))) head(universe, 10) ## [1] "ENSG00000174371" "ENSG00000117009" "ENSG00000284770" "ENSG00000285053" "ENSG00000143774" "ENSG00000143801" "ENSG00000143353" "ENSG00000117691" "ENSG00000117625" ## [10] "ENSG00000143469" length(universe) ## [1] 10273 1.3.2 KEGG (ENTREZ) ENTREZ_universe <- read.table("inclusion_tables/cassette_exons_universe_table.tsv", header = T) %>% dplyr::select(gene_id) %>% unlist() ENTREZ_universe <- unique(unlist(strsplit(ENTREZ_universe, ","))) ENTREZ_universe <- bitr(ENTREZ_universe, fromType = "ENSEMBL", toType = "ENTREZID", OrgDb= organismDB) %>% dplyr::select(ENTREZID) %>% unlist() ## 'select()' returned 1:many mapping between keys and columns ## Warning in bitr(ENTREZ_universe, fromType = "ENSEMBL", toType = "ENTREZID", : 0.91% of input gene IDs are fail to map... ENTREZ_universe <- unique(unlist(strsplit(ENTREZ_universe, ","))) head(ENTREZ_universe) ## [1] "9156" "8564" "6905" "2987" "5664" "127018" length(ENTREZ_universe) ## [1] 10220 1.4 Render the book bookdown::render_book("index.Rmd", "bookdown::gitbook") install.packages("bookdown") # or the development version # devtools::install_github("rstudio/bookdown") 1.5 Session info sessionInfo() ##
